column4: my battery symbol is gone from my taskbar, how do I get it back?
right click on the panel, select add to panel and find the right applet
it wasn't listed
it is there, it might be called power management or something
there isn't power anything on the list
if it was on your panel, it is in there
unless you uninstalled it or something

I believe you can edit the path in /etc/environment
PATH="/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/bin/X11:/usr/games"  ????

make it PATH="/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/bin/X11:/usr/games:/usr/local/arm-elf/bin"
